description:
Download this detailed guide to hiking and make sure you are prepared for your next trek!

Hiking is an outdoor activity that consists of going on a long walk in a natural environment. These areas usually have great scenic beauty, and make the activity all the more soothing and enjoyable. Some hiking essentials include packing adequate food and water that will be sufficient for the whole duration of the trip. You should also dress appropriately so that you are protected from extreme weather conditions. Other security measures include, taking a first aid box, following a specific route from a map, taking extra food and water, and staying together with the group to prevent accidents and injuries.
